member.name: T:Aspose.OMR.Api.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The Aspose.OMR.Api contains main OMR methods for template generation and images recognition.

member.name: T:Aspose.OMR.Api.OmrEngine
member.summary: The OMR engine. Handles the creation of the template and image processing classes and GUI components.

Template content encoding

member.summary: Creates the instance that allows working with specified template.
member.param: The path to the OMR template file

member.name: M:Aspose.OMR.Api.OmrEngine.GenerateTemplate(System.IO.MemoryStream,Aspose.OMR.Generation.GlobalPageSettings,Aspose.OMR.Api.ImageCollection)
member.summary: Creates a template (.omr) and template image based on MemoryStream
member.param: The stream which contains markup lines
The global settings applicable to all page elements
Collection of images that can be used for a template generation. Allow to use images from MemoryStream instead of file system

member.name: T:Aspose.OMR.Api.TemplateProcessor
member.summary:
Class for processing templates and images.
Each instance of this class works with a single OMR template. It is able to recognize images of the template specified in the constructor.

member.name: M:Aspose.OMR.Api.TemplateProcessor.RecognizeMultiPageTemplate(System.String[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Recognizes multi-page template
member.param: The path to the images to recognize
(Optional) The recognition threshold in range (0..100). Only elements filled above threshold will be counted as filled.

member.name: M:Aspose.OMR.Api.TemplateProcessor.RecognizeImage(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Recognizes image
member.param: The path to the image to recognize
(Optional) The recognition threshold in range (0..100). Only elements filled above threshold will be counted as filled.

member.name: M:Aspose.OMR.Api.TemplateProcessor.RecognizeImage(System.IO.MemoryStream,System.Int32)
member.summary: Recognizing image from memory stream
member.param: Memory stream of image.
(Optional) The recognition threshold in range (0..100). Only elements filled above threshold will be counted as filled.

member.name: M:Aspose.OMR.Api.TemplateProcessor.RecognizeFolder(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Recognizes images from folder
member.param: The path to the folder where the images to recognize are located
(Optional) The recognition threshold in range (0..100). Only elements filled above threshold will be counted as filled.

member.name: M:Aspose.OMR.Api.TemplateProcessor.Recalculate(Aspose.OMR.Model.RecognitionResult,System.Int32)
member.summary: Updates recognition result using fine tuned parameters.
member.remarks: Use this method to improve the recognition results
member.param: The recognition result to update.
(Optional) The recognition threshold in range (0..100). Only elements filled above threshold will be counted as filled.

member.summary: Control displaying of score value.

member.name: F:Aspose.OMR.Generation.Config.Enums.ScoreDisplay.DontDisplay
member.summary: Score value will be hidden from user. Score value still participate in recognition and total score amount. will be ignored.

member.name: F:Aspose.OMR.Generation.Config.Enums.ScoreDisplay.DisplayAsExtraColumn
member.summary: Score value will be displayed as extra column and will be visible to user. Score value participate in recognition and total score amount. will mark score column position among other columns. Please use only one such header

member.name: F:Aspose.OMR.Generation.Config.Enums.ScoreDisplay.DisplayInsideCell
member.summary: Score value will be displayed inside each cell. Score value will be places inside each bubble. In current version - one digit per bubble or exception will be thrown. will be ignored.

member.name: T:Aspose.OMR.License
member.summary: Provides methods to license the component.
member.example:
In this example, an attempt will be made to find a license file named MyLicense.lic in the folder that contains the component, in the folder that contains the calling assembly, in the folder of the entry assembly and then in the embedded resources of the calling assembly.
[C#]
License license = new License(); license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic");
[Visual Basic]
Dim license As license = New license License.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic")

member.name: M:Aspose.OMR.License.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of this class.
member.example:
In this example, an attempt will be made to find a license file named MyLicense.lic in the folder that contains the component, in the folder that contains the calling assembly, in the folder of the entry assembly and then in the embedded resources of the calling assembly.
[C#]
License license = new License(); license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic");
[Visual Basic]
Dim license As license = New license License.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic")

member.name: P:Aspose.OMR.License.Embedded
member.summary: License number was added as embedded resource.

member.name: M:Aspose.OMR.License.SetLicense(System.String)
member.summary: Licenses the component.

remarks.p: Tries to find the license in the following locations:
2. The folder that contains the Aspose component assembly.
3. The folder that contains the client's calling assembly.
4. The folder that contains the entry (startup) assembly.
5. An embedded resource in the client's calling assembly.
Note:On the .NET Compact Framework, tries to find the license only in these locations:
2. An embedded resource in the client's calling assembly.

member.example:
In this example, an attempt will be made to find a license file named MyLicense.lic in the folder that contains the component, in the folder that contains the calling assembly, in the folder of the entry assembly and then in the embedded resources of the calling assembly.
[C#]
License license = new License(); license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic");
[Visual Basic]
Dim license As License = New License license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic") Can be a full or short file name or name of an embedded resource. Use an empty string to switch to evaluation mode.

member.name: M:Aspose.OMR.License.SetLicense(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Licenses the component.
member.param: A stream that contains the license.

remarks.p: Use this method to load a license from a stream.
